title: loading screen was all black.
body:
okay I been trying to play and when it gos to loading screen it just black and is doing nothing. 
I dont want to get banned for AFK when its not me and its on you guys!
NOT SURE WHATS GOING ON WITH IT. 

my PC is up to date and everything is working only game that is not working iS LEAGUE OF LEGENDS.

replies.body: I don't want you to get a leaverbuster either, so let's squash this asap!  Stick to custom games for now to troubleshoot, but so you know these black screens happen when your connection can't download assets.  It's failing to reach the game server, so it craps out as a black screen.  You'll want to go through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up and strengthen your network.  I hope that helps!
